mapper.select: SELECT /*UserPortfolioMapper*/ * FROM TBL_PORTFOLIO order by CREATE_TM desc

/*UserPortfolioMapper*/ SELECT SUM(CASE COURSE WHEN 1 THEN RTICIPATION_TM ELSE 0 END) AS SUM_1 ,SUM(CASE COURSE WHEN 2 THEN RTICIPATION_TM ELSE 0 END) AS SUM_2 ,SUM(CASE COURSE WHEN 3 THEN RTICIPATION_TM ELSE 0 END) AS SUM_3 ,SUM(CASE COURSE WHEN 4 THEN RTICIPATION_TM ELSE 0 END) AS SUM_4 ,SUM(RTICIPATION_TM) AS SUM_A ,ROUND(AVG(STFT),2) AS AVG_A FROM TBL_PORTFOLIO WHERE MEMBER_ID = #{MEMBER_ID} AND DATE_FORMAT(START_TM , '%Y') = '2021' AND COURSE IS NOT NULL
mapper.insert: /*UserPortfolioMapper*/ INSERT INTO TBL_PORTFOLIO ( MEMBER_ID, YEAR, START_TM, END_TM, RTICIPATION_TM, PLACE, COURSE, COURSE_PRGM, PRGM_NM, EVALUATION, STFT, EVAL_OPEN_YN, PROF_STFT, EVALUATION_TACHER, FILES, CREATE_TM, UPDATE_TM ) VALUES ( #{MEMBER_ID}, #{YEAR}, #{START_TM}, #{END_TM}, #{RTICIPATION_TM}, #{PLACE}, #{COURSE}, #{COURSE_PRGM}, #{PRGM_NM}, #{EVALUATION}, #{STFT}, '0', 0, '', #{FILES}, now(), now() )
